content:
The Penn State womens hockey bench celebrates during an eventual  win over Robert Morris on Feb PERIOD   PERIOD

Despite having just completed what was arguably the greatest season in program history Penn States  campaign has come to an end without an NCAA Tournament berth PERIOD

The Nittany Lions were ranked for the first time and won the CHA regular season title PERIOD However neither accomplishment was enough to propel the blue and white to the postseason PERIOD

Thus Penn States season came to a close when it fell in the semifinals of the CHA Tournament losing  to Syracuse PERIOD

This loss undoubtedly contributed to the Nittany Lions missing out on the eightteam field of the NCAA Tournament PERIOD

MORE HOCKEY COVERAGE

Despite a late push Penn States CHA Tournament experience was shortlived PERIOD



If youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Despite losing to Syracuse  in the semifinals of the CHA Tournament whats next for Penn State moving forward is a step in the right direction PERIOD
